Translations.Text: O my fil ir fetch Joseph his frat neniam despair di grace Neniom despairs de di grace disbelieving popol

When ili entered (Joseph's) kvartal ili dir O vi nobl unu ni sufer a lot de hardship our famili ni brought inferior goods. Ni esper vi don us plen mezur est charitable al us. DI REKOMPENC DES charitable
Li dir vi recall ki vi Do did al Joseph his frat when vi est ignorant
Ili dir Vi est Joseph. Li dir mi est Joseph here est my frat. DI BEN us. Est because se 1 plumb righteous life steadfastly perseveres DI neniam fails rekompenc des righteous
Ili dir DI DI ver prefer vi over us! Ni est definitely wrong
Li dir Tie ne est blame vi hodiaux. Maj DI forgive vi. De all merciful unu Li est plej Merciful
Pren this cxemiz de min; when vi jxet gxi my patr vizagx his vizi restored Bring your whole famili ven me
Eben karavan alven their patr dir mi sens odor Joseph. someone enlighten me
